head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WERBER, ANNE M. (NEE SULLIVAN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WERBER, ANNE M. (NEE SULLIVAN)

block.p: WERBER-Anne M. (nee Sullivan), of Great Neck, NY died peacefully at home September 7, 1997 after a long illness. Beloved wife of Frank. Devoted mother of Frank Jr., Robert, John and Andrew. Dear sister of Clare Kavanagh. Loving grandmother of Nicholas, Elizabeth and William. Sisterinlaw of Isabel Sue Werber, Florence M. Werber,and Raymond E. Kavanagh. Visitation at Fairchild Sons Funeral Home, 1570 Northern Boulevard, Manhasset, Monday 79PM; Tuesday 2-5 & 7-9 PM. Funeral Mass Wednesday 9:45 A.M., St. Aloysius Church, Great Neck. Burial at All Saints Cemetery, Great Neck. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Pathfinder Village for Down Syndrome Children, R.R. #
